typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as short,
		Rating as short,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceCSV
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string,
		dateOfETL as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceDB
Select1, Select2 union(byName: true)~> UnionByName
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
DerivedColumn2 select(mapColumn(
		title,
		movie
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
sourceCSV derive(title = upper(title)) ~> DerivedColumn1
sourceDB derive(title = lower(title)) ~> DerivedColumn2
Select2, Select1 union(byName: false)~> UnionByPos
UnionByName sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
